title: aruL purivAyE
sahitya:
aruL purivAyE aDiyEnuyyavE karuNAkaranE kArtikEyanE


anupallavi

  varadan enum arum perumai perugavE marudamalai mIdil uraiyum muruganE


caraNam    shOdanaiyAl manam sOrum pOdellAm vEdanai tIravE un Adaravaik-kOruvEn
nAdi vErillAda pEdai nAnenbadai nI terindiruppavan AdalAl parindE
